question: Any comments?
transcript: No, I just, so I am an introverted person and I wanted to control my stress, but I was being controlled by stress. So. And there is a solution to controlling it. I know. I am working on it. I am trying to working on it. One of them is to, look to the mirror, see yourself in front of a mirror, and talk to yourself, and imagine that you are the examiner and the candidate at the same time.
